mapper.select: CREATE TABLE SPOTS( id VARCHAR2(50) NULL , name VARCHAR2(50) NULL , category_id VARCHAR2(50) NULL , subcategory_id VARCHAR2(50) NULL , image_id VARCHAR2(500) NULL , address1 VARCHAR2(50) NULL , address2 VARCHAR2(50) NULL , ophour VARCHAR2(50) NULL , phone VARCHAR2(50) NULL , lng VARCHAR2(50) NULL , lat VARCHAR2(50) NULL , regdate VARCHAR2(50) NULL , lastdate VARCHAR2(50) NULL , user_id VARCHAR2(50) NULL , properties VARCHAR2(4000) NULL , avg_rating NUMBER(3,2) NULL );
